synopsis.text: Lavian "Lavi" Winslet grows up in poverty in North Ambria, the poorest region in Zemuria. Seeking to protect her homeland and distinguish herself from her grandfather Vlad, once revered as a hero but later revealed as a traitor, Lavi joins the Northern Jaegers mercenary group. Though still a rookie, her dedication and competence earn her peers' respect. When Lavi repeatedly violates rules on missions, she's ordered to form a reconnaissance platoon with Martin, Iseria, and Talion. Together, they must infiltrate the mighty Erebonian Empire and uncover intelligence on the mysterious "Hero of the Empire" who threatens North Ambria. Will this reckless but devoted squad succeed in their vital and dangerous mission into enemy territory?
